mapper.insert: insert into users(userid, usercode, username, password, sex, telephone, issutdent, st_number) value(#{userid}, #{usercode}, #{username}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{telephone}, #{issutdent}, #{st_number})
mapper.update: update Users set usercode = #{usercode}, username = #{username}, password = #{password}, sex = #{sex}, telephone = #{telephone}, issutdent = #{issutdent}, st_number = #{st_number} where userid = #{userid}
